content.en: Hello neneka san, I am a new fan of yours who just found out about your channel due to your bad situation. I felt happy when the community has help you when you are in bad time. Watching you this few days has gave me happiness. I am happy that your graduation is going to be a happy one. All the best in the next life!

I'm not really great with words, so I'll keep mine short. Thank you Neneka for everything you shared with us!!
It was only been a couple of days since I've found you through a community post. It was one great of a ride with the community you built including you with your smiles, laugh and giggles, we will always be here to support you on your future. We love you always, until we meet again. Neneka Best WiFi

Neneka-san, I would like this not to be a farewell message, more as a good-luck message. The past few days watching you grow and grow has been a blessing for us all. It was a shock to us at first, but now we understand, and we are happy that your graduation will be a happy graduation. We are proud of you, and cherish the memories that we made deeply. Not every goodbye is gone, after all.

Ganbatte, Neneka-san. Good luck and Otsunene!

Hi Neneka-chan,

Thank you very much for giving me joy. It broke my heart when I knew about your situation, and I’m really happy we managed to help you out of it. I was in the same situation before, so I understand. Please, get a good rest, eat a good meal. We will support you no matter who you are or what you do. Please take a good care of yourself.

Dear Neneka,
I found out about your efforts and your circumstances from a friend who was reposting your reddit post. I began to watch your stream during your current stream marathon. I am so glad that I did.

Your efforts and your hard work inspire me. You make every stream interesting and fun to watch. You sing so well, and seeing you interact with your friends and the chat is a blessing. 

I will not say goodbye.... I look forward to seeing more of your efforts in the future, even though you may no longer be Neneka at that time. 

Thank you so much for choosing to become a VTuber. Myself and this community will find you and support you again. For sure.

Hello Neneka,

Thank you for your stream and everything. I found your channel through a post on Facebook. Watching your stream always bring joy to me. Wish you a bright future after graduated and start as a new persona!

Love from Malaysia â¤ï¸

To Neko Neneka

This is the letter i will give it just for youâ™¥ï¸.
Neneka,the first time i saw you you were very cute and very pure to my heart,ever since the comunity post you,i saw it and rush to help support you, this is the first time i supporting a working hard vtuber like you, ever since time went by, you have been the one that i watch ever in YouTube,i have been posting drawings for you in the discord (i don't have a Twitter)and supporting you along in this 14 day stream marathon,it's like a very long beautiful dream for me ğŸ˜‡ğŸ˜‡ğŸ™ğŸ™â™¥ï¸â™¥ï¸â™¥ï¸.
But now you will graduate and become a new vtuber,hearing it makes me very sad indeed...ğŸ˜¢ğŸ˜¢.
But you will always be forever in my heart and will be the precious memories that i ever hadâ™¥ï¸â™¥ï¸â™¥ï¸.
When you become a new vtuber,don't worry i will come find you and support you forever.

From your Baguette servantğŸ¥–ğŸ¥–

Neneka-chan, thank you for streaming for 14 days. It gives me a lot, and sometimes it gives me a mood buster of doing my activity. We want you to be happy, and don't try to hard push yourself. And i say, "Nene-chan, congratulations on your graduation. See you again."

Dear Neneka,
it was day 2 when i discovered your stream. I was laying in bed at 2am and about to fall asleep when i clicked on your stream. I watched you playing Eternal Return Black Survival until i fell asleep on my own. The following days I continued to watch your stream. What I found was a very kind and hard working person with a big heart. Hearing you sing for the first time was one of many beautiful moments I experienced these last few days and I will cherish all those great memories forever. I will continue to support you and wish you all the best for the future. We will meet again.

Congratulations on your graduating Neneka, I found you through a post and started following your streaming marathon from day 2. During watching your stream I saw your hard work to give the best to everyone and I really appreciate that even though I never sent a donation. I will continue to watch your stream until the end, I can only wish you all the best and I hope you will be successful when you debut with new persona, hopefully we can meet again.

Your Servant, Komazura

content.en:
To my Dear Neneka-sama:
This is [Chat].
I made this message for you as your loyal servant. I wish you the best of life, and no matter what happens you will always be my Queen Vtuber. No matter what the other servants says to me you will always be my Queen. Please let me call you Neneka-sama.
Whenever I see you awake, I get up in bed and watch your stream, and Whenever I hear your cute voice my Heart melts. I am sadly broke, but no matter what, I will always Support you.
Im sad that you turned down all the ads as it is the only way for me to support you. Please take note this is not me being pity but this is me being kind as my goal in life is to spread Positivity and Happiness. And I really wish you to have a Better Life as you Deserve it. I will never forget the Neneka-sama that I always wake up for.
I just wish that you will remember me as loyal servant after your reincarnation.
My love for you cannot be described by just using words. I love you so much and I will Look  Forward for your Reincarnation! - â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸

Hello Neneka! Thank you for your hard work and amazing streams. The past few days have been amazing thanks to you. I look forward to watchin g more of your content.
Life is hard sometimes but im glad that there were so many people around to help you even though I could'nt do much other than tune into your streams. I'ts sad to see you go away so suddenly but I will await your reincarnation in whatever form you may choose!
We are always here for you. Fight!

Hello, Neneka-san, I heard that you're the sweetheart everyone has been swooning over these past few months, and this last two weeks has been even more so with the rise of Overseas fans for you. I'm also part of the overseas fans that comes across your channel from another fans which made me to stumble upon your channel. It has been fun, whenever you're streaming and playing games with your friends, your laughter and your reaction, they grow steadily over these past few days. I may not be dropping by your stream much often unline anyone else, but I am truly happy that in this fleeting time, I had my moments with you. However, the time for farewell is here. 'Neneka Neko' may be bidding her farewell now, but I'll try my best to seek your other self that'll eventually comes again in the near future. I bid my farewell with you, by wishing you no less than a grand success a d healthy, long lasting peace and life full of blessings. Please, be happy. Seek your path without regret. We will welcome you again in whatever form you may appear as.

Sayonara, Neneka-san.

Yo~  Neneka-oujo 

I am new to your streams since I only knew your presence due to the video about you. After spending time watching your streams as of late, i wish i knew about you sooner. I will support you as much as i can until your Graduation!. Of course I will also support you once you get back to your new Persona. It has been really fun in your streams and you are a very good player. What you experienced in your life was really hard and i really happy to have met you. Always look forward and continue to have strength to go on. Your are an inspiration to all of us specially to what you showed us. I hope your situation gets better and take good care of yourself, we your supporters are here for you. I will always wish and pray for your happiness. See you soon with your new persona Good luck to you.

Much love

Hey Neneka, I may have been a new fan but I just want to sincerely say that you are amazing. My time watching you may have been short but it will leave a lasting impact to my career, and my personal life.

 I am happy that I have seen your growth and was a part of it, this moment will forever remain in the community and always in my heart. I know that it might be hard for some of us to see you graduate but if it's what you want, and for you to improve as a content creator, I will gladly support you.

 Until we meet again Neneka! May you have a bright future.

Hello Neneka,

First of all, I really want to thank you for the happy moments that you gave to us. Life can be cruel sometimes yet you're still doing what you can to be the best version of yourself. It shows how strong a person you are and I admire you for that. My only regret is that I wasn't able to lend you my support sooner. I will pray and hope for your success in the future.

Hi Neneka-sama. This 2 weeks journey is amazing isn't it? You have accomplish a lot of things. I found it really enjoying watching your streams, and it brings warm to my heart. Life can be difficult at times, but someone will always be there to help you. As "Neko Neneka" is leaving, just like others "Servants", I wish you good luck on your new journey. And hope your success can reach as high as the sky, as far as the horizon can be.

I don't really have much to say. I hope we will cross the road of life and see each other again.

Hello, Neko Neneka. I'm not gonna write a farewell message but more of a goodluck message. First, congratulations on your debut Ojou!!.. Our time together must be short but i had a great time accompanying you throughout your journey as "Neko Neneka" I hope we can also accompany you in your new life as a new vtuber. You are the first vtuber i really put my attention to and I am not going to regret it one bit. Oujo, we will always remember and cherish you in our hearts. Don't forget to spread your wings becuase you're an angel, and no matter what the obstacle is just keep moving forward. Remember Ojou, that at the darkest times and when you think that hope is no longer by your side don't lose hope because when there is darkness there is light. I hope that you are going to have a successful future, Oujo-sama.

Yo, Neneka-san
I'm not really sure what to write, but thank you for everything that happened over past few days
Thank you for bringing so many people together, be it in chat or discord
I better keep this short, since there are so many messages
What happens now is just the start of a new journey, take care of yourself

Hello Neneka!I just wanna say thanks to all of your hard work and effort u put on your stream.Thanks also for bringing us joy laughter and happiness!I wish I succeed on your carrier of Vtubers. Remember we will always support you. Even if you reincarnated as a new Vtuber

Thank you for the great time we spent together, You will always be in our hearts. And remember to keep strong after all, This is not a goodbye but a see you again sometime.
Thank you for everything

Hey Neneka, you are a strong and amazing person. Thanks for always bringing us so much joy! I wish you happiness and good health. 

Until we meet again! (â—•á´—•â—)â™¡ âœ§*ã€‚

Dear Neneka,

I only found out about you and your situation quite recently. Even though, I can only understand simple Japanese, your streams are still entertaining. Thanks for all of your hard work! After all that you have went through, you deserve it. Life is hard and what you went through is saddening but it all went well in the end. Your channel has expanded not only within Japan, but around the world as well. While it is sad that we're saying farewell to your current persona, this is a new beginning to a brighter future. Let's forgot the past and look towards the future. Don't give up! We fans will support you no matter what.

Dear Neneka-san,
when I have heard about you, I was moved and wanted to see your streams for myself, and I am really glad I did. I felt really comfortable in the first few minutes of your stream and stayed up until late in nights just to watch your stream. Hearing you laugh, giggle and just being yourself made me feel so happy. And the community that you have gained is the best I have ever seen. I want to say honest "Thank you Neneka! Thank you for being yourself and for bringing joy to us. The past two weeks are going to stay forever in my memory. Thank you for becoming VTuber. I wish you all the best for the future and I will continue to support you. Until we meet again."

With all the love,
Endy

Hello Neneka.

I only got to know your stream as of recently. But, it was always fun. Either chatting with the community or watching you play games, or study English. I wish you the best on your future journies. I will follow you to the end. â™¡

Neneka-sama,
It has been a great journey, especially the last 14 days. It makes me happy to see someone who has been struggling gets the love they deserved. With great success comes greater challenge, sooner or later the hater will come and makes things hard. But i want you to know that there are people that loves you. We wrote this later because we care for you. So when things gets hard, don't hesitate to reach out. Surround yourself with positive energy. Surround yourself with people you enjoy talking to. Surround yourself with people who cares for you. We will always support you with whoever or whatever persona you become in the future. Thank you for being a part of my life.

Farewell, Neneka-sama

It has been a fun time for the short 1 week i have known you and it was a very good experience! I wish the best for you, and i hope you find happiness neneka-san!!! I will never stop supporting you whenever and wherever

Neko-Neneka, Thank you for showing me someone who does not give up and fights hard and believes in what she does! You inspired me to draw again! I will continue to support you no matter what character you choose! Best wifi!

Hello Neneka 
Hasn't been long since i found your channel from vtuber clippers & seeing your growth from 4k to 60k is something amazing, knowing your living condition is rough, i've decided to stay & support you. Not gonna say goodbye but rather we'll be waiting for you.
Thank you for making fun streams & remember that we are always here for you.

Dear Neneka, 
Since the day I susbcribed to your channel in November, I have always believed that you will be successful. From that time until now, I have sent three superchats which, while it's a small amount, should help you in your expenses.

Well, here we are now. You became the fastest growing VTuber of this month thanks to some kind people who learned about your condition. Many people in the community have answered your call for help and donated a lot. Wow, you have achieved so much, and I believe that you will achieve more in the future.

As the curtain closes on the 28th, it will give way to a brand new journey. I wish you well in the next chapter of your career as a VTuber.

Until then, see you again, Neneka.

Your long time servant,
Chris

I discovered you from news on the r/VirtualYoutuber subreddit. I'm glad we are able to help you out. I'm sorry for hearing about the 14-day streams too late and was only able to join in on the 8th day. I admit that at first the announcement made me sad, but now I realised that this reincarnation is to put you in a better position in your life. Obviously I have wishes and how I want things to turn out. But whatever happens is for the future. Even though I'm unable to support you financially myself currently, I will be here to support you in spirit. I am very glad to have discovered you, and no matter what you'll do in the future -- no matter as who, we will remember you for who you are, we will love you for who you are, and we will continue to support you! I wish you all the best in every aspect of your life, and I hope we get to see you again soon!

I have been on YouTube for a very long time. I used to scroll though videos for hour simply trying to find something nice to watch. But one day I came across your channel. Your videos were great and funny. You had a personality that made me smile, and I loved watching every minute of every video. Since I found you my world has gotten brighter. Thank you!!

Hi neneka-san.
Just know that whatever tough things you have gone through, it will pass and I hope that we 'your fans' have at least  put a smile on your face. When I heard about what happened to you, I immediately tuned in to your streams and actually you are the first VTuber I donated to but don't mind it, I was really happy that I did that after all no one deserves to be sad on this world. Be happy okay? We are here for you.

Dear Neneka
I haven’t been around for very long, only since around 10k, but in the short amount of time I’ve been following you, you’ve grown so much, and it makes not just myself, but everyone so happy to see you successful. You truly earned every subscriber you got, and I wanted to say thank you for helping make my dull and painful life a little better with your streams, even though I was never able to stay for very long. I truly enjoyed stopping by for ten minutes every day, or however long my work would allow. I know you likely won’t have time to read every message, but I still wanted to put everything I feel out there for you on the off chance that you do get to read it. So here goes: thank you for making the effort to connect with every single one of us, even if you don’t understand English fluently, you still made an effort to read and to respond to as many English comments as possible. You put in the effort to stream for 14 days straight, and put in the effort to make sure your streams were entertaining for everyone. I hope that you’re in a better situation now than when we all rushed to try and do our part to help you, all of our superchats and streamlabs donations, as well as all the gifts you received. You brought so many people together for a singular goal, and helped to create a United community that I hope will carry forward past just your current V Tuber. I hope we are all able to continue being your fans for long after your graduation, and that you remain the high energy, dedicated, amicable person that you are, not just in streams, but throughout life

Dear Neneka-san,Thank you for all the efforts you have done so far. I believe you are a very hardworking,determined and lovely person. We really loved your stream,especially when you laughed everytime you were happy. I will always support you no matter what you plan to do in the future and we will never forget about you. All we want is for you to be happy. I look forward to the day we may meet again. Ganbatte ne! Love you!

Dear Neneka,

Thankyou for everything. It's been a fun journey and it's kinda sad that you already reject me 3 times already lol. But just remember this, i'm still gonna support you no matter what. Good luck on your new journey!

Dear Neneka,

Thank you for the fun times that you gave us. It's been a wonderful 14 days that I will never forget. To be honest, I've never really devoted so much time to Virtual Youtubers until I found out about you. I did heed the call because I was saddened about your situation and wanted to help. However you quickly grew to me and such I stayed. I liked you very much to the point it felt natural to be here. You became one of the VTubers I promised to support for a long time. Thank you for the wonderful community and happiness. Good luck in your new chapter in life! Until the next time we meet, Otsunene!

content.en:
Neneka, 
At first I joined with a curious mind about a Vtuber who was in need. My impression at the time was “Oh, this is nothing new”, but I decided to stay a bit longer. To be honest, you have a charm that no others have and that drew me in. Starting from day 2, every moment was so precious, every time your PC crashed, the Discord server, your genuine happiness from unboxing the gifts,... Although my time with you is not long, it gives me many different emotions, experiences that I have never been through my entire life.

Thank you, thank you so much for your stream, thank you so much for the “Oh my pasta”, thank you so much for giving me many wholesome moments.

I wish you happiness and an open, successful career waiting for you ahead.

I promise that I will find you, support you and accompany you wherever you go, whatever character you have.

Your fan, your servant.
though the days I got to know you may be short, I'm glad I got to experience it. Me and many other people are hoping to see you again, bless you on your new journey.

A very great thing happened here. People from all over the world came together to support you and showed how strong solidarity can become, an experience I will never forget. I really enjoyed every single second I spent in your streams. They were filled with a lot of funny and extremely cute moments. Not only did we try to help you in such a dire situation, but we got to know about all the other amazing small Vtubers you have played with. They grew bigger as well and gained a lot of new fans and that all thanks to you! An important lesson for big streamers. I wish you only the best! I am looking forward to supporting you in the future again.

please dont forget about us
i am not very good with expressing myself so ill keep it short please remember us as do the same in keeping you in our hearts and memories i found you on your 14 days livestream and naturally i felt drawn and i watched your streams Daily these past weeks if you do leave..... please never forget about us 
thank you for all your hard work thank you so much for this short yet memorable time

Neneka - Congratulations on your graduation! I found out about your marathon after a few days. I think your voice is great, and I think you're very genuine. Your streams are very fun to watch, and I like that you stream with so many friends. I am very happy that you are successful! I'm happy that I found your stream and I will continue to support you in the future!

Neneka

I've been supporting since early on and I'd like to thank you for all the entertainment you have provided. I wish you only the best for now and beyond your graduation. I can't wait to meet again!

259.nickname: Emperor of the French, Charles I

content.en: I have discovered Neneka only a few days prior, I'm impressed at how despite the numerous hurdles life had thrown at her, Neneka still fought. I myself regarded her as a brave person, and I can never forget brave people. If I could give a Legion d'Honneur from my server I would've gave her instantly. Keep fighting life and fate. "When you mean it, only God can stop you."

content.en:
Neneka,
Honestly, I didn't want to write here.
The idea of farewell just doesn't seem right at this point...
As you might know, the term "graduation" has a sad history in the vtuber community.
There were indeed sad farewells after a short timeframe with other vtubers you may or may not know about, won't give an example here.
This, however is different.
I mean, this is only the beginning right?
You're heading on a new path, which is graduation is at its finest.
But let's not concern about the future in this situation.
After all, this isn't the last time we will interact, right?

Hello Neneka, I am one of your servants. I'm not very good at saying what I think, but I would like to leave a message. To be honest, when I first saw the post about you, I was just curious about your situation. But as time went on, I think I started to check your stream. I am not always here due to my studies, but I would like to see your stream from the time you wake up until the time you go to bed. I don't have any money to donate, but I support you with all my heart. Your smile and laughter inspire me every day. I hope to see you again soon. No matter what storm you encounter, remember that there is always a big, beautiful rainbow ahead. Thank you for fighting through life's hardships, and thank you for being a part of my life ğŸ™‚

Dear Neneka-sama,

Thank you for your hard work. It's been tought right? I hope we overseas viewers made your mood even the slightest happiest. Thank you for everything. Even though I haven't join your stream due to school, I know that you are doing your best. We may part ways, but I know that one day, we will meet again. Congratulations on your graduation Neneka-sama. Farewell.

Hello Neneka-san!

I want to thank all your hard work that you have been doing for the past month. Firstly i want to congratulate on 60k subscriber it really have been a long trip to get here for all the hard work you have put in and you really deserve it.

Secondly even if your life have been worse just keep in mind that all the worse thing that have happen to you will convert into many wonderful things in the future 

Thirdly i am so happy that you are finally able to live in a stable condition having such wonderful community , friends and the people who support you and i hope in the future when you graduate things will be more lively and more happier for you and you will always wake up everyday with a bright smile and a have good future ahead.

lastly even if it sad for me to see you go but i will always remember the stream you have provided us and all the happiness that you and all of us community share, we will still support you no matter what obstacle we have to face and i hope your nxet stream when we visit you as a next avartar will be heartwarming and hope you welcome us with an open arm 

NENEKA-SAN thank you very much for all the things you have done for us and i hope we will meet again soon
WE LOVE YOU AND WILL NOT FORGET YOU

content.en:
Hello neneka!

I just wanna thanks to all of your hard work, you are an amazing person. Thanks for always doing your best. I will never forget this moment, a moment that you show me how strong are you. Remember we will always support you no matter what. Good luck and wish you all the best.
Thank you for everything neneka.

I'd like to thank you Neneka for being yourself, as it was your amazing personality that just kept drawing people in. I have been happy to have contributed what I could into a community that was filled with well-meaning people. I wish you the best in all your endeavors and you'll be sure there will be people like us supporting you along the way!

After having found Neneka from a friend, I was compelled to watch her and help. I watched during the 2nd day of the marathon stream. There is the appeal of watching small vtubers so I always watched. I can't give much but I did my best to help. I'm happy Neneka is doing well now and possibly starting new. Good luck to you Neneka and we're happy with your choice. We'll still support you! ğŸ’™

To Neneka-san,

It was by accident that I came across your stream on February 14th. I have to come understand the appeal that is Neko Neneka which is why I have tuned into your stream at all times, except when I was sleeping. This has been a unforgettable experience and as day 14 approaches, I can proudly call myself a servant until the end.
Neko Neneka is graduating, but I will continue my support in the time to come. With that said, good luck, do your best and otsunene! ( ï¾ŸĞ”ï¾Ÿ)b

I don't know how to say. but i am very proud to be part of this community, i have never liked vtuber before. However, since peoples recommended you I was interested in taking a look, and don't know why I fell for you. thanks for being part of my life, hope we can meet next time

Hi Neneka,

Even though I found out about you 2 days into your 14-day streaming marathon, I genuinely enjoyed every moment of it. 

We have been with you all the way for this journey and you have an incredibly bright future up ahead, and we will with you all the way for that as well.

We thank you for your streams. We wish you good fortune, good health, and a good life.
Neneka Ojou, It has been a good ride in this 14th days.. congratulation for your Graduation, i hope we can find you wherever you are Neneka Ojou.. no matter what, we will always love you

To:Neko Neneka
 I was fortunate enough to be guided to your stream on the second day of the marathon, i knew nothing about you prior but i had a strong feeling that i needed to get to know and support you so i plan on doing in the future no matter what, i'm a Biomedical sciences student going thru hard times but you made me smile and laugh a lot so i'm very thankful !!  I wish you all the happiness and success in the world now and in the future, FIGHTING!

I found your channel through a clipper and joined your stream since day three of your fourteen-day marathon. It has been an entertaining ride, and I hope you can stream without worrying about your financials.
Good Luck in the future.

Hey Neneka, 

although it was short I enjoyed your content and the live
streams. I am happy that I met you and that I could support you. 
Thank you for your hard work and perseverance which inspired me a lot. I wish you the best for your future and I hope we will be able to meet again. You can count on my support. 

Thank you and take care of yourself!
Thank you for these past 2 weeks Neneka, It was really fun and wholesome. Wish you all the best, you deserve it. You will always have a special place in my heart. Until we meet again.

content.en:
Dear Neneka,

I may have only found you on the second day of your 14-day stream-marathon, but these past two weeks have been the best I've had in a long time. You, your friends, and this healthy community have lifted my spirits after a depressing family situation. I may have skipped my chores and school assignments to watch your Livestream, but it was worth the trouble. I hope that we as a community were able to help you in any way we could from the difficult situation you were dealing with. We are very proud of your accomplishments and the work you have put in for us. Never give up on who you are then nothing can bring you down! We will forever be your faithful servants! Take care.

Love from Germany

Hello! I haven't known of you for long, and I don't speak Japanese well, but I appreciate your hard work and determination! I hope you will continue to find success, happiness, and friendship!

And now, for a joke! A whale walks into a bar. Ouuuuu~ ğŸ³

To Neneka chan,
Thanks for your hard work because of this you become famous and more people come to watch your stream. Congratulations on your milestones, achievements and on your graduation. Your streams are fun and endearing, I enjoy watching them specially when you nteract with your friends. I'm happy that you enjoy chatting with us.
 I'm really proud of you. You really deserve  all the love and gifts that you received. I'm excited to see your new persona/character. I know that your just graduating and changing your persona but because of this character "Neko Neneka" you achieve your goals, become more famous and more people comes to watch you. I'm both sad and happy because "Neko Neneka" will be gone, but it will be replaced by a new one."Neko Neneka" will stay in our heart forever. 
We'll treasure all the fun memories that we had, and I'll never forget the time we've spent together. Thank you for everything and for all your hard work. Good luck and I'm looking forward to the next adventure of your new persona/character. And I will.... No we will keep supporting you in your graduation and in your new chapters of being v-tuber. Always remember we're here right beside you till the end. Take care of yourself and keep smiling . Until we meet again Neko Neneka.

 We love you Neko Neneka!

Dear Neneka

Congratulations on your milestone! I wish you good luck on your future endeavors and for the content you will release in the future. We servants will never forget you as Neneka and the person behind Neneka. Do remember that I will always wish for your happiness and will support you in the near future. After all, that smile and laugh is worth listening for.

Dear Neneka,

In the past couple of days, far before i started working on this website, I got to appreciate a whole different side of your vtuber existence: The amazing people that i got to meet through this community, where everyone cheers for and supports you. I will continue watching your videos, supporting you and wish you the very best for the future no matter when or how you will return! By the way, if you've read this far and you see a neneka somewhere on your screen, try clicking on her!

Hi Neneka. First of all sorry for my English and Japanese I dont speak them really good. I met you not long ago but i really enjoyed watching your stream and supporting you. I hope you will have a good life. Good luck with what you will do. I will always support you.
Thank you for all your hard work. We will continue to support you in the future! We will be your servants forever, we love you!

Neneka, you have a bright future ahead of you. I want to be there supporting and cheering for you every step of the way. Always stay positive because when you are happy and smiling, you make me and many other people smile right back at you. Even though you have been through a lot, you continue to move forward and I admired you for that. I hope you have many great memories with us. Take care.
Neneka-sama, thank you for giving us joy eventhough I can't understand most of the thing you say. It's been a really fun stream. I wish you luck in your future. And Sayonara, I will miss you so much.

Dear Neneka-san

Thank you for these 14 days streaming! I'm really happy to have met you.
It was an experience I'll never forget.
I wish you good luck on your future!
I hope that we'll be able to meet again.
Again, thank you for all your hard work!

See you soon, and take care of yourself!

Hello Neneka,

I really happy to know you and become a part of your journey, even it is just for a while. The 14 days stream will be one of my precious memory. I'm hoping to meet you again in future and watch your stream.
Neneka-san, thank you for always giving us joy! It was really fun to see you streaming. I wish you luck in your future activities. Let's meet again soon!
Neneka, I had a lot of fun watching your stream, it was a first for me to actually be engaged with a streamer! Congratulations on your Graduation. Thank you so much! I hope to see you soon!

Congratulations on your milestones and achievements. I might have been late in supporting you but I have sincerely been enjoying watching you and your friends. We know it has not been easy but from now on, you have all of us supporting you on everything even when you change. We look forward to meeting the new you. Thank you!

Ohanene,
I feel sad because I discovered Neneka recently. 
I have enjoyed this short time with Neneka, so I want to thank Neneka and I hope I will be able to see Neneka again soon.

Dear Neneka, our strong precious angel..the world has been very mean to you but yet you still stayed strong. You might not know this but your smile…your sweet smile has saved many people, it has saved me. This world is very scary and sometimes it can be very hard to smile. My precious brave ojou always remember that there is always hope and if you keep smiling the whole world will also smile of you because the world will get tired of making you sad. I am just a man behind screen and you are just a girl behind the avatar, but you are so strong and I am amazed by your beauty as a person who keeps fighting and smiling even when the world is so mean, you might think you’re not strong but personally I know a strong person when I see one...my precious ojou...let’s stand strong together and face the world. My precious ojou...the girl behind the avatar is very strong..I am sorry that times are hard..but always remember to smile ojou...we all love you..as long as I know you are safe, healthy and happy I am at ease...how can the world be so mean to a precious girl...when you are feeling down...remember us...we are here for you...we are all cheering for you..I know that you are strong my precious ojou..I’m sorry I can’t give much...but all I can give are my words, love and support...I want you to be happy, healthy and safe..whenever you are feeling down..please always smile my precious ojou..keep your head up high..please take good care of yourself..I want you to be happy, safe and healthy...we will wait for your return...no matter what I will always support you my precious ojou and all your decisions. And as long as you are safe, healthy and happy I am also happy..The world is a very mean place, but please keep fighting and smiling my princess ojou...I know your smile and love will prevail..let’s face the world together ojou...never stop smiling my precious brave ojou..we love you!!ğŸ’™

I'm not good with words, but I'll try to say it. Neneka-san I've witnessed your struggle, effort, and your resolve to fight through the tough ice-cold and the harsh sides of life. Even asking others out of sheer will and desperation. I find it really inspiring on how hard you're clinging to life, you are strong. And now after keeping the difficulties of life at bay. Now, you're changing and grasping the chance you've been given to have an overall better and brighter tomorrow. I am happy that I am able to have witnessed your resolve and courage, while unintentional, you've given me a little slither of light. Whatever decision you have come to about, be it to stay as a vtuber/streamer  or explorer other parts in life; I wish you nothing but happiness and success for your goals, endeavours, and in life.

Hi Neneka-san!
Sometimes life can be hard, but that means much better things await you, maybe some group of strangers from all over the world could appear out of nowhere to tell you that you are not alone that we are here to support you.
Neneka-san keep fighting and don't give up!
Finally, always remember that, somewhere in the world someone thinks you are special!

hello neneka! thank you for the stream! i found about you recently in my recommendation, i love watching you streaming and play together with your friends.

I must say sorry that i can't watch your stream for a long time because of my limited time and internet, but i will definitly watch you when i can!

Neneka, i hope that your new journey will make you more happier than before. I will wait for your return and i hope that i can find you so that i can keep supporting you!

Hello, Neneka

First of all, congratulations on your milestone. I hope you are doing well. I am really enjoying your stream and being part of this amazing community. During your journey I hope you find more happiness and we will await your return in the near future. Thank you and the best of luck to you.

Good job on the 14 day stream! Although I couldn't make it to some of streams since I had school, I tried to support you in every way I can and will still support you. I hope that, like your journey with Neneka, you will grow just as fast on this new journey. See you later!

The time we've spent together was short, but it felt like we've been together for a long time. We might've came because of your background, but we've stayed because of your personality and its genuinity and of course, of how cute you are. This might've been the end of "å­ç‹ã­ã­ã‹" but the inspiration that you gave me to choose the path that makes you really happy will forever stay in my heart and most probably everyone's. It might be a rough and torny road that you chose but we will always support you. We love you ã­ã­ã‹ã•ã‚“

Neneka's stream has been an experience I won't forget, it was worth losing some hours of sleep just to watch. I have seen other VTubers before, but I have never been as invested in anyone else other than you. Thank you for the memories, and I will await for your return. This is even my first time writing directly to a VTuber. I wish I could put my feelings more elegantly, but I think there are no words to describe how happy I am to support you and be among a great group of people.

This is not "good-bye". It is "see you later".

Dear Neneka,

Thank you for the 14 day stream, Neneka. It's been a fun journey and I'm glad that I got to meet you because you always make me smile. It was really fun watching your stream even when your sleeping. I will continue to support you no matter what. Let's meet again soon and I wish you the best of luck on your new journey!

As human beings, we are all striving to be better. We experience many obstacles in achieving our goals. Sometimes it can be scary to ask for help, but you had the courage to reach out to an amazing community! We are always here to support you!

Dear Neneka-san
Even though I may be a new viewer, and sometimes manage to catch your live-stream.
Congratulations on being able to withstand during your hardest times, and still did your best.
And thank you for the content and streams you have managed to put out for everyone to see and enjoy.
May you never change as a person and continue to make yourself and others around you happy!

I wish you the best of luck in your journey.
May we see you again
Take care and have fun!

Otsunene!

Thank you for your hard work for the last 6 months!

I look forward to your future activities as new Vtuber

You have my continuous support!

I have lots of fun watching you stream Neneka, I wish you the best of luck on your next journey. Stay safe, and stay happy.

I won't forget the moments you've created for us as Neneka.
See you once again in the future!
Neneka-san, thank you for the 14 day stream, hope it wasn’t too bad on your health. 14 days went by fast. I hope you have a good life and can have a less stressful life in the future.

Hello Neneka,
There is one time where you asked in your stream if it's okay to be happy and that really strucked me hard. Yes, you deserve happiness so don't be sad, we're here for you. Above all, I wish for the best on your next journey.
Thank you for working hard on streaming it was really fun! 

I won't forget Neneka.
See you next time!

To Neneka:

Congratulations on your 14 day stream! Thank you for all your hard work. While my time knowing you was short, you have given me so many memories that i will cherish. Thank you for smiles and laughs you have shared with us on this journey. Neneka may go away but we will support you where ever you may go. Take care of PC-kun.

content.en:
I started watching your stream on the 3rd day of your 14 day stream.
It's the greatest memory I've had! I'm really happy I get the chance to meet you!
Whatever happens, I'll always support you. So please, do your best!
Also, I'll look forward to your return!

Dear Neneka san

Being a part of your community was fun. Your streams are fun and your followers are friendly people. We wish you more success, and we will eagerly wait for your return.

Dear Neneka, I hope first that you are getting better every day and that your community is grateful to you. I was part of the recent western raids you went through and I loved seeing how you kept up with everything and tried to support both languages. When I heard you were leaving, I did not close your stream and tried to catch up on what I might have missed. I sincerely hope that one day you will come back and leave me a token when you are out. In any case, "live happily ever after and be free from the cycle of dissolution".

Dear Neneka-sama, even though i haven't been your fan for long i really enjoyed your streams,and even though your announcement came as a shock i just want to say that i will always support you with everyone here. I hope you won't forget us because we will never forget you, and i promise that somehow we will see each other again.

Dear Neneka

Your community has grown in such a short time. We're happy that we could have helped and to be apart of your journey. I hope we can continue to support you in the future, and to see the great things that you will do.

Neneka.
Your story made me not want to sleep on your channel, and I'm glad I didn't. It was a great community to be a part of and support you. Please keep up the good work and take care of yourself.

Hey Neneka, after watching your stream for a few days in the background while playing games, I was really surprised by how kind and supportive the people who watched you were. I personally also wish you nothing but the best, and hope the rest of your time in this life is great! Wishes from UK

Neneka-san!

Thank you for always giving your best, we are all proud of you! Knowing you even in this short span of time gave us lots of fun and irreplaceable moments and memories. I'm looking forward to your return and take care always! I'll give my best to support you! Let us all make more fun memories together with the listeners now and in the future!

So many messages were already done by so many people...
I'm both sad & happy for you - Sad, because I couldn't enjoy being with you for much time, hearing you sing many songs, laughing, enjoying yourself with games and discussions. But I'm happy that the support of so many people helped you to go through these difficult times.
I will try to look for what you'll become in the future, you are an hard working, a cheerful person.
Do not overwork and think to eat & drink water regularly.

Hello! Im not good on long messages so i make it short. Im on stream since second day.i found your channel thru community post. I was really sad almost have tears on my eyes. i feel happy since there alot of overseas whiling to help you unto some stuffs. Im very happy im been part of this community too and i wont forget whose things like your giggles,laughs. Till the end i will support you.

Neneka-san, I found out about you recently during the 14-day stream. Even though I don't know you for long I will continue to support you and I'm not the only one. I like to watch you laugh and have fun with your friends. I wish you all the best!

Yo! I just want to say thank you and keep smiling
goodluck to you!

content.en:
Hello! I joined Half way through your 14 day stream. When I figured out that it was a 14 day stream, I was honestly impressed! I didn’t think it was possible! I only got to watch one APEX match though on day 7 because of school. I tuned in a few times afterwards and still do just to see how your doing and if your alright. With everything going on, I still try to watch your stream as much as possible. Even tho we have a lot on our plate, we’ll always make time for you and support you. Although I’m new, I’m in it for the Long hall! Keep up the hard work!! We believe in you! I’m honestly hyped to see what happens next! 

Much love and keep up the hard work!!

Dear Neneka-san,
Thank you so much for making the amazing content that you have created, and watching your stream for the last few days really helped me deal with some issues of my own. I heard about your situation through a community post and it really sat with me because I have been through tough times in my own life as well, and I understand how hard it may be at times to push through. It is amazing to see this community come together and support you, both through words of encouragement and with gifts and donations. I wish I was able to support you monetarily as well, but all I can do now is give you words of encouragement. I wish you great fortune in the future, and I will continue watching and supporting you no matter which persona you use. You are truly a blessing to us all!

Lots of love from Germany.

Thank you for all the memories! I may have only joined and started supporting you on your second day of the 14 day marathon but now I have become a lifelong servant. I will miss Neneka, but I will support you all the way! Until we meet again. You've worked hard! Neneka best wifi!

content.en: Hello Nene! I remember discovering your channel through Reddit a few days ago. I wanted to support you because of your story, but also ended up supporting you because you seem like a great person. I am aware that I don’t know you in real life, but I still hope you have a better and happier future from now on. As a fan and as a person, it’s just nice to see another person happy. If and when you comeback, I’ll be sure to support you! Good luck!!!ğŸ’™ğŸ’™
Neneka our Queen. Thank you for spending some time with us, Remember to prioritize your health above all else. Cheers to you and your future! I'll see you again soon!!

Thank you for all the joy and entertainment you have given to us! I may have only found you through a community post on Youtube, but I have become a lifelong servant who will continue to support you in the future. I will miss you but many happy regards to the upcoming future. Until we meet again!

Thank you for everything you have done and for all your hard work. It has only been a couple of days since I found you, but you have brought so many smiles on peoples faces including mine. You will be missed, but not forgotten. Keep on fighting!

I've only been here for a few days but there was a lot of fun memories with neneka chan and us servants
I haven't been active in your streams lately since i've been studying japanese really hard just so that i can understand you and the other vtubers i look up to
I really love your cute personality. And your voice is really ASMR material ^v^)b
In the future i wanna make lots of fanart of you!
Thank you for existing!

Hello, Neneka.

You've reached many milestones. Congratulations. I have only watched a short time, but it was very impressive and enjoyable. This is the first time I've stayed up all night to watch someone on video. Having said that, I admire your patience more than mine. This may be the last time we meet, but if we happen to meet in another persona, I hope you are well and having a good time. You are a fine person. Even when you need help yourself, you help people like me, your viewers and friends. It's an honor to meet you. I wish you the best of luck.

content.en:
Greetings Neneka-san my message for you will be short but I poured all my feelings onto it, I hope you will like it.

When flowers bloom,
We're not together to appreciate.
When they wither, We're not together to grieve either.
If you ask when we would miss you?
When they bloom, When they wither.

In short we will support you on what decision you make.
Goodluck on your journey as a vtuber

Hello neneka, congratulations on the milestones you achieved, Even though it was a short time ago that i discovered you I enjoyed your content and have a high respect for the perseverance you've shown, I hope in the future where you became a newand independent vtuber I can still watch and support you but most of all I hope you'll live a very happy and good life. I will await your return and I just hope I can find you again in youtube so that I can watch and support you again, Good Luck and have a good life

hello neneka, first of all congratulations to you for the milestones that you have reached. i sincerely enjoy watching your stream together with your friends, it was really fun. i hope that your journey will be filled with happiness. we will await you. thank you and goodluck to you

Dear neneka,

I watch vtubers at a casual pace to kill time if ever I am bored. One day I found out about most of what's happening after doing a bit of research on the situation, so I kind of can connect a bit, I will support, not in donations, sorry, but I'll try to arrive in your streams when I get the chance to, not just me. I wish to see how everything continues from here, Ganbatte!

Dear Neneka
We the community  are happy for what you achieve, I saw your post in Reddit about your situation. I rushed in your stream and saw that you are doing a 14 day live stream, Can't send superchats or donation but I shared it everywhere I could you can get the support you deserve. Congratulations on everything you achieved, we will never forget you and always wish the best for you even you're graduating, we're gonna miss you Neneka.

Neneka, we all wish you well, and thank you for the time that you stuck around with us. This has been a wild ride and I'm sure no-one expected how big this would blow up and grow, but I'm glad that it did. No matter what happens and no matter where you go, we will be there for you. To all the best wishes that I and all the others can give, while this may be the end here, it is just the beginning as well. I hope the coming days will bring you a smile to your face, because the last few days has brought a smile to ours.

Neneka-san, even though I came in a bit late, it's been a really fun and nice ride. During these 14 days stream, I've felt a lot more emotion than I thought I can. I'm pretty sure a lot of people agree, so we will definitely find you again, and accompany you again on your next life. Until then, don't give up on your dream and keep smiling.

To Neneka-san:
Take care of yourself. Life is precious and so are a person's dreams. Whatever you decide to do, good luck. You have friends around the world who wish you the best. You're not alone.

Dear Neneka
Thank you very much for your two weeks of streaming. Don't know what to say but I would like wish a best for you and stay positive like you are right now . Can't wait to see you again

content.en: ohanene~ as i am writing this, i am thinking what else i can say that many have not said yet. Not because i want to be different but i want to express what this journey has been like.  You are the first vtuber that i actually interacted with, that i felt i wanted to contribute to this person. This was a short time indeed, but life is made up of short moments like this. Moments that make us cry, laugh, frustrated, angry, and make us want to try again. Some time in the future, i hope we can look back to this moment and smile at it. That taking on this adventure was worth it. I hope that this moment gives you strength to take on the next challenges life will bring you. And know that sometimes, you get the most growth (in subscriptions lol) while sleeping xD. So take care of your health, if you ever feel stuck, learn something. It does not matter what, the point is to get moving again. We are here, lurking in chat, - fellow overseas ikemen (lol)

To Neneka
Congratulations on your graduation. It was only during these last 14 days that I got to properly know who you are and discover how fun it is to watch you, but I'm truly glad that I got to spend every single one of these days watching you have fun with your friends and all the thousands of fans from all over the world who gathered around just to support you. Your hard work and dedication deserve all this and so much more. I was overjoyed to be able to help translate your words so fans could understand you better, and even more so that you appreciated me doing so. I will gladly work hard to be able to continue doing the same in the future. Building this discord and interacting with all these new fans who came to love you was also a very heartwarming experience. I hope we were able to build a place you can call a second home. I'll never forget. You asked before for people to like you for who you are on the inside, and I'd like to say that at least in my case, I definitely came to love everything about you. I wish for nothing but your continued happiness and success in the future, and that wherever you may choose to go, you'll go there with a big, beautiful smile on your face. And I hope to be always be here to cheer you on just like I am now. Please never give up and keep growing. May we meet again soon. We'll always love you.

Hey Neneka, 
These last few days sure have been crazy haven't they? Thank you so much for everything, the times I've been able to tune into the stream are definitely memories I will cherish forever. Even though our time together is coming to an end I sincerely hope that our paths cross again soon.

Dear Neneka,

I've only known you for a very short time but after watching you pour your heart and show passion into what you do it's hard to not
follow and watch how you do. Natural attraction so to say. Continue to do what you love and the rest will follow. You may not realize it
but when we see you happy it also makes us happy as well, we all wish to see you smile and laugh. I don't speak for the community but
im pretty sure if you are to be reborn into a new persona we'll follow you nonetheless.

This is not goodbye, only see you later.

Hello Neneka-san, I found out about you recently during the 14-day stream. 
Even though I don't know you for long I will continue to support you and I'm not the only one. 
I like to watch you and have fun with your friends.
No matter what happens, I'll always support you. 
So, do your best!
Neneka-san, thank you for the stream and your efforts to entertain us. I will never forget what you have done, and I am grateful for it, and I wish you all the best in your future travels

Neneka, thank you so much for everything until now. When I first saw you I didn't think I would come to like you this much... "like" as "admiration" please don't get me wrong lol
a farewell is sad but I know Neneka will be okay because she's a hardworker. I don't say goodbye, I hope to see you in your next "life". matanene!
I really enjoyed seeing how happy Neneka looked when she is streaming. Neneka has problems in her life, but she is always mentally as strong as steel. I'm touched. We will always support you.

To Neneka

Hello, Neneka! I heard about you through the VTuber Community on the third day of the 14-day stream, and you seemed really cool, so when I had spare time, I made sure to come by and hang out! I had fun while I was there, and I'll continue to have fun when you graduate, since I'm definitely coming back! It was a fun 2 weeks, and here's hoping to more under your new name!

content.en:
Dear Neneka-chan~ 
When I first saw a clip of you and heard of your story, I rushed to help out someone in need. When I arrived at your stream, watched and listened to you – I stayed for the person behind Neneka-chan~ ^^ Cute streamer, great gamer, awesome singer – what’s more to love ^^ 
Now, Neneka-chan will graduate and will come back as a new vtuber. These 2 weeks have been amazing and have shown what a great and wholesome community the vtuber audience can be. 
I also want to thank you very much for opening and showing me the world of independent vtubers – I have discovered amazing places that I wouldn’t have without you. 
I will definitely follow you once you reappear and am looking forward to a new journey with you leading us once again. ;3 
Thank you very much Neneka-chan for being awesome and I am looking forward towards the new you.  
I wish you the very best! Until we meet again!

Thank you for everything! I have honestly enjoyed your streams and they really made me feel at ease every time. I’ll always hold on to these memories of Neneka; and when you return I will support you once more, no matter what. Until then, look after yourself and be happy! Thanks for all your hard work!

content.en:
Hello,

I don't have a lot to say. You're the only Vtuber I've ever watched for very long, because I really appreciated your sincerity. Streams aren't really something I enjoy very much, and yet I found myself checking in on your stream very often. I don't want to get too personal with this message, but I hope you're in a good spot now, and that you continue to do well into the future.

Stay safe.

I have loved your streams ever since I found out about you after searching up Marika's circle.
I remember the first stream I watched was of you playing Mahjong Soul and you fell asleep, I am not sure why I stayed around until you woke up but I am glad I did.
Watching you grow from 300 people, to your milestone stream of 600, to your monetisation and finally reaching all the way over 50k people now, was a really enjoyable journey!
Thank you for sharing your journey with us! We hope to continue watching you in the future, be it as Neneka or someone else.

Dear Neneka, thank you for this 14 days stream, even we just met so shortly, you will always be in my heart, you are not gonna be changed for being the first vtuber that I watched for a half of a day even I don't understand what you say if there's not TL... It's always fun to watch your stream... really I never got bored... I know life is hard sometimes but  I believe there's must be a way. I believe this is the greatest and hardest way you chosen, I will still support you. Take care yourself, don't push yourself too hard. Until we meet again.... Neneka Ojou-Sama. Will remember and miss you forever

Ojou-sama,
Congratulations on your graduation. I'm here from day 2/3 of the marathon. Your voice is really nice. And the community I have mate touched me. I wish you all the very best for your future. Keep working hard and it will pay you back. And remember we are always here for you all you have to do is call for us. Thank you for all the good memories you have given us.(â—•á´—•â—)ğŸ’™ğŸ’™ğŸ’™

I'm not really good at words so I'll keep this short. Thank you for all the laughs and giggles that you shared with us. We will always be here to support you on your future endeavors. Until we meet again. Neneka Best WiFi
Neneka-san, I just want to say thank you for making my day better every day with your interesting content and good luck with your upcoming event. I will always support you!

Neneka,

I can't believe that 14 days has passed this quickly. I am very happy that I found you and I hope to see you again - as Neneka or anyone else! I have loved every minute in your livestreams and I hope that you enjoyed doing it just as much as we the audience has loved watching it. I wish you luck in your future, no matter what path you decide to take. ğŸ’™

Neneka sama, it feels like it was just yesterday I found about you on the community post. Your precious reactions and everything about you will be missed. These tears really messed up my words. Anyway, godspeed on your new persona and do whatever that makes you happy. Can't wait to support your new version!!! 
For the bonkguetteğŸ¥–, shimobeğŸ™‡ğŸ»‍â™€ï¸, omagahğŸ˜§ and oh my pastağŸ, cheers!

Hey! I had came across your stream due to a post from somebody on my YouTube feed. Been watching you ever since for the last 4 days or so. Although it's a little sad that you'll be leaving this character and moving on as another, I will continue to support you. I haven't been able to watch all of your streams live because of the time zone difference but whenever I do it's quite fun. Especially the community, the people here are something else lol. Hope that whatever you do in the future and the choices that you make lead you to a better and happier life. The past was the past and most of the can be left behind, although you shouldn't forget about some things because those were life lessons. Let's instead look towards the future for a brighter and happier tomorrow! Push through your struggles just like you did with this one, and keep being the energetic and hopeful you! UNTIL NEXT TIME WHETHER AS A VTUBER OR AN ARTIST, I WISH YOU THE BEST OF LUCK ON THE JOURNEY THAT IS YOUR LIFE!

Regards from you humble servant, Alone

Dear Neneka-san
I actually came across you thanks to a facebook post, I heard that you were doing a 14 day marathon and then I was just, shocked, I didn't thought that someone can put so much effort into something, I liked that, and when I watched your stream, I was shocked again, I saw you didn't have a moving 2d design, I was surprised by that, but it didn't matter, you, yourself was delightful, I like that about you, your laugh, giggles, whenever you're happy, it makes me happy as well, even with your new persona, I or actually we, we will be there to support you again and again and again, you're one of the vtubers that I'll gladly sacrifice my time to, we still have six days until you have a new design, until then, let's make it the most memorable six days, I'm pretty sad about it but I just think about the effect it'll have on you, having a new design will be a bumpy experience at first, but, we'll still be there to support you, after all, you're still the same person that caught our hearts, let's not be sad about it, let's be happy that it happened, I'm still young so I don't have that much money yet, but someday Neneka-san, I'll send a superchat, you can bet on it. ğŸ’™

I know I'm not the only one to say this but thank you so much for the time you were here as neko neneka, we will never forget you and we are all so happy to meet you and see you succeed. Personally I was also passing through some tough times, but seeing you be strong and go through has inspired me to be stronger and better as a person. Thank you Neneka! and may the memories that we share never fade!

I wasn't able to watch alot of your streams because of school, but when im watching im amazed by the community, you inspired me, thank you. theese 14 days were amaizing, hopefully we can watch your stream once more. â¤ï¸

Hello, Neneka,
I've been watching you since day 4 of your 14 day stream. I really enjoy watching your streams. I usually don't bother to watch live streams. I prefer to watch the clips, but that is not the case here. Your streams are really fun and I enjoy them a lot. I'll keep watching your streams after you graduated.

Dear Neneka-sama Thank you for the few days that I could spend watching you and having fun. It was a very long time since I have been supporting someone so much with my whole heart. It may not be the same after you graduate, but I will keep the few days as a treasure memory, and will look forward to support the next persona you will become

Thank you neneka for the 14 days stream,
it was fun and congratulations for your graduation, 
We will always support you and please don't push yourself too hard,i hope i can meet you again.

Thank you for the past two weeks. Even though I didn't see your debut last year. I'm glad I got to keep a special place in my heart for you. I've watched many vtuber streamers, some big and some small. But, you and your community truly ranks highest. Again, thank you for choosing becoming a vtuber and helping everyone in your community.

content.en:
Greetings Ojou-sama. I know that.. I just getting to know you because of the community mentioning about you. At first, I was a bit curious about what they mentioning about you until.. I decide to take a look for myself.

After reading someone comment about your current situation, I was moved and felt sorry for you. I just wish I could helped you with donation or buying whatever you need just for you to live in comfortable life but.. I couldn't do it.

All I can do is... Is to participate with the community and supporting you till very end. Even you will graduate from being Neneko... We will still cheering you up no matter who you be because.. we are your servants. And will still stand by your side whenever you need.

Hello Neneka! I wasn't able to watch alot of the stream because of the time zone difference, but the times I would be there I'd consistently be blown away by this experience and the community you've grown. Your story from being a relatively unknown Vtuber to where you are now has inspired me to help out this community more than ever. I fully understand this was a 14 day journey, but I can gladly say these 14 days were the highlight of my year. Best of luck on your next journey, and hopefully we can all be reunited again. Much love
I really enjoyed seeing how happy Neneka looked when she is streaming. Neneka has problems in her life, but she is always mentally as strong as steel. I'm touched. We will always support you.
Neneka-san, thank you for your hard work so far, even though there are many difficult things you might go through, we will still support you at any time, so keep your spirits up and keep smiling !!

Who knew some random Reddit post on r/virtualyoutubers would bring me on this journey and community, even if I wasn't a consistent viewer for personal reasons I was glad I was there to see you rise up from your challenges. Best of all to you Neneka, I'll be a servant to the end!

content.en:
Dear Neneka,

I've only known you for like 2 weeks or less but during those times i enjoyed your streams. Most of the streams are usually about you just sleeping so i slept with you during those times. I'm glad that we, the vtuber fan community was able to help you in your time of need. I am also happy that you called for us! Anyways Neneka we will never forget about you. We will always remember you. Even if you are graduating. To us, Neneka will always be in our hearts!â™¥ï¸
Hello neneka sama. I hope you will be in a great health. We will always support you in your next career. I just hope you will always be happy in life and always stay cheerful..

At first, i thought there was no way I would be able to actually enjoy the streams due to the language barrier, but the instant I got in and saw your hard work on studying english and saw how supportive the community was i knew it was something i wanted to be a part of. Even after your graduation I hope this doesn't change and i will be rooting for your "new you" success whoever this will be.

Hi Neneka! Found you during your 70+ hour stream during November, and have been a lurker for the most part since then.
Glad that you slept during your 14 day stream ğŸ™‚
Seeing the community grow so explosively has been cool, but I hope you haven't been overwhelmed by how much of your audience is English.
Thanks for your activities as Neneka, and we'll look forward to your activities in the future ğŸ™‚

Thank you very much, Neneka. I really appreciate being your fan and supporting you. Thank you so much for all your hard work. I look forward to seeing you next time. Whoever you will be, I'll wait for you.
Despite the short time I spent lurking in your stream, I enjoyed your stream and I wish you good luck for the upcoming events. If I ever meet you again, I'll gladly be your servant again.

Dear Neneka-san, I’ve only recently found your channel but took a liking to it really fast. At first, I was just enjoying your streams, watching you laugh and giggle, being very friendly to the chat. But the more I watched them, the more I was getting a lot of motivation from you, seeing what you had gone through and where you are now. You are a great and hard-working person. Thus, I am really glad about your decision. Even though you will start from the very beginning, all of us will be there to support you when it is needed and when it is not need too ğŸ˜Š. Once again, I am very happy that I found your channel, so I would like to wish you all the best and staying as positive as you are now forever.

Dear Neneka,

I'm truly thankful to you because you truly made my life easier to live; and you've introduced me into this community full of really nice people! We will keep supporting you in the future!!
Ganbaguette!!!!!
Thank you Neneka! For building the most wholesome community and for entertaining us. I wish you the best of luck on your next steps! We shall support you along the way. Ganbaguette!
