content.en:
To Neneka
I one day decided to browse r/VirtualYoutubers and found I post talking about your situation, I've been tuning into your streams everyday since the 3rd day. I just wanted to say thank you so much for you streams, I can't understand a lot of Japanese but I can still have fun while watching your live streams. I've talked with a lot of people during the stream while you're sleeping and found a community which I interact on daily, yesterday we did some karaoke and it was one of the best days I've had since quarantine. I don't understand what you're saying most of the time but I'm glad that I can always tune into your streams and watch you or talk with people in chat to pass time. I really the best for you and these memories will stick with me for years, ãŒã‚“ã°ã£ã¦ â¤ï¸ ğŸ˜­ â¤ï¸ ğŸ˜­ â¤ï¸ ğŸ˜­ â¤ï¸ ğŸ˜­ â¤ï¸ ğŸ˜­ 
I will always remember you and support you for the years to come, THANK YOU!

I wish you the best.

Well we're all sad but happy at the same time. When you graduate and start your new persona we will instantly know just by your personalutu and voice. We will miss you and we can't wait until your next debute.

-C4kokonuttheory
Good luck for your future Neneka! We will always support you. Thank you for giving us happiness.

Thank you Neneka , the 14 day stream was the best days of my life. We will miss your laugh and giggles. We want you to try your best and we will always be here to support you. We met new friends because of your stream. I will always remember this 14 day stream. Always a servant, We love you... Neneka
To Neneka-san , we will always support you and i would like to sincerely thank you for introducing me to quite possibly the most wholesome community! Baguettes and blue hearts. ğŸ¥–ğŸ’™
Become stronger! love you! We will wait for you next time! Let us know!

Congrats on completing your 14 day stream, Neneka! It's too amazing that I don't know what to say. It was super fun. Even when you were asleep, your servants would party with each other like a fam. Thanks to Neneka, I got to know about RUMURUMU... epic 14 days! Neneka, thanks for being everyone's WiFi. Even if PC-kun crashed sometimes, good job for holding out till the end. GG. Finally, thank youuuu for continuing to be a Vtuber. Will always love you, my WiFi!
Neneka Best WiFi.  Thank you and GoodLuck. Shimobe FAQ Forever!!!!

Hello Neneka-san, we hope you're doing well.
This may be a short encounter and one sided but you showed me how it feels to trully care for someone, to know the feeling of wanting to know the other's condition, to look forward for the next meeting, and i thank you for that. You were the first stream that i actually look for and watched for hours if not days. We wish you the best for the future, take care!

Neneka  it was really nice to meet you and  Your working hard so much and do your best to us and it was sad that we cant see you again but in the future we will see you each other again it was so much fun  and still supporting you until the end!.. We will miss you and we never forget you!..we will see eact other again!..

godspeed on your new persona
even if the rabbit hole contiunes to deepen as i tumble  headfirst at terminal velocity il never stop supporting you
Thank you for the fun times and streams Neneka. We will continue supporting you in your next life too

To the person behind Neneka, I salute you for being a strong person. It's only for a short time but I treasure the memories we all have with you. Thank you for everything. I am now sending you off with a smile, till we meet again, Ojou.
Thank you for the stream Neneka, I will Always be your 1st servant , Thank you For Enjoying Everything and we are grateful on having you.

Dear Neneka-San, 

This is the first time I have ever actually simped or cared for someone this hard. Even if you graduate from being Neneka, everyone here, especially me will always love who you will be and who you are now. It's sad to see that the Neneka we know of now will graduate BUT if you get a different persona, we will absolutely find it and support you even more! Godspeed neneka, goodluck, have fun, and thank you so so much for introducing me to the most wholesome community I have ever encountered! See you next time in your next reincarnation.

Neneka-san, thank you for the streams! I wish I had known about you sooner, though for the short time watching you I had a lot of fun and it made me happy. I wish you the best in the future and know you will succeed. Thanks for all your hard work and everything you've done! I'll continue to support you in the future. Forever the best WiFi.

I'm sad that I could not see you as Neneka anymore but this week was a real emotional trip for me. I never supported someone with such determination and I'm really happy that we all could helped you in your choice. Hope to see you again. With all my love.

Neneka-chan is the best. The past 2 weeks have been really fun and I hope you had as much fun as all of us. I and all the other servants will patiently wait for you. We are all cheering for you. See you later, ojou.
Neneka best wifi.
Neneka, I won't ask you to try your best, I know how hard you have worked up till now. Please continue to strive for a future where everyone can smile together.

Hello! You probably won’t recognize me amidst all the servants that you have gathered throughout this week! When I began this server on the first day of your 14-day stream marathon, I did not expect the fan-server I made would gain so much traction. Your channel has grown so much since that day. I hope it continues to thrive and will grow much bigger after your graduation, we love you for your personality, so no matter where you go we’ll follow, new persona or notğŸ’™. This little community I created, was only possible because of you and many others that stepped up to reveal to us your a kind and sweet personality. I hope I can keep supporting you from the sideline like I have been since day 1. Goodluck!!!!

P.S, long live #1st Gen Servants

Hi Neneka! I just want to say that thank you for this past few days that you've been streaming, I've felt happy and excited when i see you stream with you friends. i'm hoping to see you again having fun like this again. take care and good luck on your journey!

I haven't watched you for long yet I feel like it's been more than a month watching your streams every morning until every night. The joy I have seeing you play games and push on with life is more than anything I can do myself. Thank you for the tears of joy and sadness I have shed. We will never forget you.

Neneka-san, I've known you for a very short time
It was short but it was a very fun and endearing ride.
Looking forward to supporting you in the future. Thanks for everything

To Neneka-san,
I'm happy I was able to meet you! I will cherish these memories forever. Good luck on your new adventure! I believe in you and will continue to support you!
Let's meet again soon!

Hi Neneka-sama!
Though I may not have known you for very long, I am still happy for the hours I did spend watching your livestreams alongside the rest of the community. Your laughs and giggles and fun times with friends always filled me with joy at the end of a long day.
Seeing the rest of the community rally together to support someone in need warmed my heart. I’m glad to see you are doing better now, that you persevered in the face of adversity, and that you are growing stronger from this experience.
I will await your return regardless of what character you become, because I know that you’ll still be the same person we all know and love. 
Thank you for all of your hard work, take care, and always remember that we your servants will always love you!

Hello neneka and thank you for giving us joy even though the language barrier that is happening between the us and you we still somehow manage to communicate and to be honest when i first discovered you i manage to give you lots of support since i found out that you needed help. Thank you for everything neneka and I hope we can meet again in another time.

Thank you Neneka. Thank you for the 14 day stream, thank you for the laughs each day, thank you for never giving up, and thank you for being yourself. I am glad to have been apart of this wonderful family you introduced me to. I hope we can make you smile just as you made us smile everyday. We will see you again next time Neneka. That's a promise. Thank you for everything, and don't forget to eat!

I know our time together has been short, but the past 2 weeks have been a ton of fun. Im glad we got to meet. I know seeing Neneka leave is sad, but I will continue to support you no matter what. I hope we meet again soon.

Hi Neneka-san
Sometimes life looks very dark, you think you have failed to do any activities that society values in your age and that you wont be able to enjoy them. Not because you are unable to do it but because you are not giving yourself the chance to do them. In times where you can only think about these negative aspects you need a good friend that gives you a hug and consoles you. You might not have friends close to you but I will support you as a servant and  no matter if it's as neko neneka or someone else.It's been a short time since i've been subscribed to you but it has been a great time and i'm glad i found your channel. I wish you all the best in your future.

Hello Neneka,

I found your YouTube channel thanks to one of the reddit moderators ChineseMaple who told us about your channel in late 2020. I immediately became curious and checked your channel out. 

I began to watch you every time you were online while I was working. It was very nice to watch you play games and talk with chat while I was working. Sadly I could not talk very much in chat, I'm sorry about that. But hearing Nenekas voice was nice and it became something nice to listen to while I worked.

When you announced the 14 day stream I was surprised but happy and when all the people found your stream and it made me very happy that other people could see how amazing Neneka is. And that people came to help Neneka out made me ven happier.
Hearing about the graduation made me a little bit sad but knowing that you will come back to us reassured me. 

I will always be a your fan, whatever you do and will keep cheering you on!
